Notes:
Here we are with the perfect release of this amazing movie.
batman colors were confusing to me but this one after working on them looks really Alive.
as usual perfect Chinese early source. we had our own HDCAM source too but decided to went with TC.
work on colors, levels, rgb, sharp, a little bit of Jon Snow magic and then synced Line audio to my finish video, which i had for 1 week. 
i had already wrote .srt for our own source but luckily TC comes with English subtitles for foreign parts as well.
its full movie, and it has all the after credits, 
watermarks are not annoying not big or anything, just appear at start then poof gone. i cut chinese intro from start so hardly 2/3 seconds of black screen is missing  yay in other words nothing is missing.

Sample included,
720p in few hours,
